author: paulhauner
content: Ropsten seems to be doing well so far. I'm noticing some skipped slots as if there might be some offline validators.

author: paulhauner
content: I can see grafitti from all 5 CL teams, so it doesn't appear to be implementation-specific.

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: It's erigon, besu and a part of geth validators missing

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: (they are missing because EL teams are not great at setting up infra in time :D)

author: parithosh
content:
TTD update notice for MSF6, new TTD is `50468767937878607003648` and aimed to hit tomorrow @ 2PM UTC. 

Configs can be found here: https://github.com/eth-clients/merge-testnets/tree/main/mainnet-shadow-fork-6

I'll be running a round of updates and using the latest version we recommend for Ropsten.
